Ribbon table

design / Bologna, Italy / 2016

  5. Client: undisclosed Value: 1.000 euros Status: Completed

    Coffee table based on the repetition of a single bent steel component. The table is part of a larger study on repetition and simplicity. A single geometry in bent steel is repeated and scaled to achieve both structural stability and a dynamic appearance with a single, simple elements. The tabletop is hand-painted with a geometrical motif echoing the structure supporting it.
